alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Franklin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 12:16AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS...SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM EST... At 1216 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower along a line extending from near Shippensburg to Hagerstown. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chambersburg, Waynesboro, Shippensburg, Greencastle, Guilford, Fayetteville, Wayne Heights, Mont Alto, Scotland, Rouzerville, Marion, Walnut Bottom, Maugansville, State Line, Orrstown, Middleburg, Quincy, Penn State Mont Alto and Shippensburg University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
